_comment3: seeded booster opening (16 cards, no land/marketing/token): https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=10154297170330307
_comment4: prerelease packs: Hunt with Valor (White), Hunt with Guile (Blue), Hunt with Ambition (Black), Hunt with Ferocity (Red), Hunt with Strength (Green)

querySet._comment: Early sets had 1/67 cards as foil, equating to 15/67 (~20%) chance a booster had a foil, and as of TSP it replaces a common.
querySet.query: from[m15_foils]?rarity=rarityByWeight2008(curm)
